name: Smoked Burrata
description: Creamy burrata with grilled peaches, prosciutto, and a balsamic glaze.

name: Charred Octopus
description: Tender octopus with fingerling potatoes, chorizo, and a saffron aioli.

name: Dry-Aged Ribeye
description: 16oz bone-in ribeye, served with smoked garlic butter and sea salt.

name: Cedar Plank Salmon
description: Wild-caught salmon smoked on a cedar plank with a maple-dijon glaze.

name: Deconstructed Tiramisu
description: Mascarpone mousse, espresso-soaked ladyfinger crisps, and cocoa dust.
